I want to connect with different credentials than saved. So I choose "Connect (with Options)" from the context menu and then "connect without credentials". So a field appears where I can enter my desired credentials.

iterations.description: Fix 'connect without credentials' displaying incorrect logon info by cloning connection info and clearing credentials in ConnectionInitiator.

notes:
AI triage (gemini): Fix 'connect without credentials' displaying incorrect logon info by cloning connection info and clearing credentials in ConnectionInitiator.
Approach: Modify ConnectionInitiator.cs to clone the connection object when Force.NoCredentials is active, restore the parent reference for non-credential inheritance, and explicitly clear credential fields to ensure the tab title reflects the 'no credentials' state.
